message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
Let's flip the script, I propose 60-40 in my favor.  It's fair to get a bit more after your generous offer.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I deserve the majority. Let's try 70-30!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but with the inflation, I need a majority to make this worth it. 70-30 in my favor is the only way to make this work for me.
I think we're getting close, let's meet in the middle and make it 50-50. It's time to split the difference!
